Fifteen year old Tawnee Wiliams was a dreamer. Not a fantasizer. A dreamer.

Her dreams were of a softer, brighter world where things were prettier and happier. There were some romantic and sexual elements to her dreams, but those were both fuzzy, and Tawnee was a virgin with no romantic experience and very little passive knowledge about sex, and no active knowledge at all/

Tawnee came from a broken home with five siblings, each with a different father, and a mother whose various habits and interests made her indifferent to what happened in the lives of her children, except for the subsidies she received for her children each month.

So dark haired Tawnee, the skinny little fifteen year old girl in raggedy clothes went to school every day, ignored by teachers and her fellow students alike, and retreated into her dreams every chance she got.

Tawnee knew who Rose was, of course. Everyone knew who Rose was. She was the badass senior who everyone avoided. Even the teachers seemed to go out of their way not to antagonize Rose. Secretly, Tawnee wished she was more like Rose, and not just a little mouse of a girl who was afraid of her own shadow. Of course, when Tawnee worked Rose into her dreams, Rose didn't look quite like Rose. Rose was still strong and badass, but Rose's appearance and language wasn't quite as jarring.

Tawnee wasn't exactly stalking Rose that day. Not exactly. She was just sort of in the same hall at the same time. I mean, school was getting out, and she had to catch the bus. So of course she and Rose would be in the same hall. And the fact that Tawnee's last class of the day was two corridors over from Rose's didn't mean anything. It was still a coincidence that they were in the same corridor when Rose went down on one knee.

When Rose did hit the floor, Tawnee's first instinct was to rush to help her. There was no one else left in the corridor, after all. Even the teachers had left as fast as possible at the last bell. But something held Tawnee back. Meeting and becoming best friends with Rose was a very nice dream, but Tawnee had no idea how to interact with real life Rose.

And then Rose just disappeared, like she had gone up in invisible smoke after some kind of flameless spontaneous combustion.

To Tawnee, it was like she was watching another person control her body. She heard herself yelling "Are you okay?" before running over to the pile of clothes. Just as she got there, she saw something she couldn't believe was true. A six inch nude version of Rose came crawling out of her pile of clothes.

Tawnee didn't know why she didn't go screaming down the hall in terror. What she was seeing didn't happen in real life. It didn't even happen in dreams. And it certainly didn't happen in the cute little movies she downloaded from the internet.

Tawnee went to her knees and heard herself saying, "What happened?" And she reached out to touch tiny Rose.

As soon as Tawnee touched Rose, there was an explosion of light in Tawnee's eyes. It was a multicolored light, and there was sweet music accompanying it.

The next thing she knew, Tawnee was climbing out of her own clothes, also only six inches tall.

Except it wasn't Tawnee who climbed out of her clothes. And it wasn't a six inch nude Rose who was facing her.

Tawnee had had a rough life. During the summer, meals were sporadic and unpredictable. During school, she got a free lunch and breakfast, while dinner and meals on the weekend were unpredictable. So Tawnee's skin, skinny build and blemished skin were the natural byproduct of such a "regime."

Rose's appearance, too, was a product of her lifestyle, though at least in Rose's case at least her lifestyle choice was voluntary.

But the shrunken Rose and Tawnee who stared at each other were the product of good diets and plenty of rest. Rose had always been big chested, but her body was firm and toned. Tawnee was big bosomed now as well, with the same taut, firm body. Both had long hair, clean and healthy, that reached down to the small of their back. To Rose's disgust, her hair was it's natural auburn color. And not only had Rose lost the edgy hairstyle she liked to sport, all the tattoos and piercings on her body had disappeared as well.

"What the fu---- fu--- fu---?" Rose shook her head, staring down cross eyed at her nose. Try as she could, she found her mouth refused to form any of many curse words that were the mainstay of her vocabulary. After a few second , she gave up and heard herself using language she hadn't used since elementary school.

"What the heck did you do to me?" Rose asked. There was a certain five letter word Rose wanted to end that question with, but her brain refused to even think the word.

Before Tawnee had a chance to formulate an answer, a male's voice from above asked, "Well, well, what do we have here?" Both girls looked up in time to see two male hands reaching down towards them.

Brittany cursed under her breath as she heard the first bell go off. She only had a few minutes left until class started, but she couldn't finish her make-up in a rush! Her short blonde hair hung just above her shoulders, complementing her blonde eyes. You could call her a bit of a stereotypical popular girl in appearance, always wearing flashy clothes that showed off her nice curves. Plus there was the fact that she was a cheerleader, a blonde, and a senior. But having a single conversation with her would prove that she is actually a kind and intelligent girl. However there were times she could be a bit conceded...kinda like when she smiles at her own reflection until she's late for class.

Outside of school they always made sure to have quality time together without anyone else. There seemed to be a faint blush on her face as she pulled Brittany's hand.

The prodigal genius that cleared her Ivy League school at the age of 13, gained her masters at 17, and was now teaching Brittany's class at 19. She was trying to gain some teaching experience before moving on to a university. Always trying to look older than her students, her long brown hair was held back by a hairband and fake glasses hung on her face. She was wearing a beige blazer and matching business skirt. Genius or not, she was pretty immature. After talking with her alone, she had found the Professor to be a pretty normal teenager with common interests. They had gossiped many times when the other students were away. Once she graduated, she would likely hang out with the teacher outside of a school setting. What stall zones she choose?
1552.title: Olivia

15521.content:
Olivia looked over at the first stall, she had no idea who was there but it was better than no help. Olivia took a deep breath and headed over to the stall. While on the way to the stall a thousand thoughts went through her mind.

"Please be nice," She thought. "Please help me and not use me as a toy. I hope she is nice. Please be nice. Please be nice."

Olivia made it closer to the stall and started to hear something. She poked her head under the stall and saw a young girl who had long brown hair. She had her face burred in her face and was crying. Olivia felt sorry for the girl. For a second she forgot how small she was and she wanted to confront the girl.

Olivia walked under the stall and stood between the giant's feet. Olivia's stomach dropped as she saw how huge the feet were. She looked up at the giant. She was still in tears. Olivia wanted to do something. She reached over to the giants huge leg and gently placed her hand on it. Olivia sighed and gently rubbed the giants leg hoping it would get her attention.

The sobbing stopped crying. She felt something on her leg. She thought it might have been a bug but when she looked she saw something she never expected. A doll sized girl rubbing her leg.

"What the hell?" The giant said.

Olivia's stomach dropped as the giant's eyes locked on her. She wanted to say something but she was paralysed with fear. The giant slowly reached her giant hand towards the tiny girl. Olivia closed her eyes and let the giant wrap her giant fingers around her waist. The giant tightened her grip on Olivia and gently raised her in the air.

Olivia let out a small moan. She couldn't believe how warm the giant's hands were. The giant's hands were a bit wet from her tears but the warmth on her bare skin felt incredible. A warm feeling came over Olivia. She felt like she was in good hands.

The giant brought Olivia up to her giant face and opened up her hand. Olivia sat on the giant's open palm and looked up at thee giant. Her face was the size of a billboard compared to Olivia. She could see could see every detail on the giants face. The small freckles on her cheeks and dried up tears running down her face. The giants eyes were still red from crying. Olivia started to feel sorry for her.

"Hey little girl." The giant smiled. "What happened to you?"

"I'm not sure." Olivia said not taking her eyes on the giant. "Can you please help me?"

After the words came out of her mouth Olivia was scared to hear the response. The giant could easily say "no you're my toy now."

"Sure sweetie." The giant said. "What did you want me to do?"

"I'm not sure," Olivia sighed. "I honesty don't know."

"How about if I take you home and we can't sort something out there." The giant said. "How does that sound?"

"I'm not to sure." Olivia said.

"I promise I'll be nice to you and take extra care of you." The giant said. "No one will be home it'll be just you and me. I know that sounds weird but I'll do whatever you want me to."

"Um okay," Olivia smiled. "Thanks."

"You're welcome," The giant said. "I'm Natalie by the way."

"Olivia," She said.

"That's a pretty name." Natalie smiled.

"Thanks," Olivia blushed. "Natalie is a pretty name as well."

"Thanks," Natalie smiled.

The bell rang breaking there focus from each other.

"I think we should go." Natalie said.

"Okay," Olivia said.

"You can sit in my bag if you want. I have my PE gear in there so it'll be more safe for you." Natalie said.

"Thanks," Olivia said.

Natalie reached over and unzipped her bag. She did her best not to move the hand Olivia was sitting on, she didn't want the tiny girl to fall off. Natalie gently and slowly moved her hand towards her bag. Natalie gently lowered Olivia in her bag and gently placed the tiny girl on her uniform. Olivia look up at the giant and smiled. She couldn't believe how nice Natalie was being to her. Natalie smiled back.

"I promise I'll be careful." Natalie said.

"Thanks." Olivia said.

"It might be a long ride though." Natalie said. "I have to take the bus so we might not get home till late."

"That's alright." Olivia smiled. "Thanks for doing this."

"You're welcome." Natalie said.

Natalie zipped up her bag and gently put her bag on her back. She didn't want to hurt Olivia. Natalie left the bathroom and headed to the bus.
15521.title: The Crying Giant

info.brief_description: A much more romantic take on shrinking in highschool.
info.description:
This story is about teenagers who shrink during school. The goal is to have a lot more story line than previous stories. Choose between male or female characters and whether you shrank or stayed normal. Shrinking can be between 3-6inch high. No other size changes or alterations. No feet, ass toilet, or farting additions. Feel free to add more people, and just have fun with it
Sexual situations are more than welcome, and so are deadly situalions as long as its not some brainless giant eating and smashing people for no reason.

50 gift points will be given to those who add a good chapter!

Chris age 18
